title: Intake Graph Schema
description: Schema for validating intake graph definitions in Skuld SKILL.md

entry_points.description: Questions that are always asked (unconditional entry points)

conditional_questions.description: Questions asked when their condition is met

handler_unlocked.description: Questions unlocked by handlers during document generation (progressive disclosure)

id.description: Unique identifier for this intake item (snake_case)

question.description: Brief description of the question asked

condition.description: Condition expression for when to ask (e.g., 'has_children = true')

sets_flags.description: Profile flags set by this question's answer

unlocks.description: Intake IDs that become available after this question

id.description: Unique identifier for this intake item (snake_case)

question.description: Brief description of the question asked

unlocked_by.description: Handler name that unlocks this question

condition.description: Additional condition for when to ask within the handler
